0011000001111111 0100010100001010 1 -> sum: 0111010110001010, cout: 0
1101110111110100 0001001000001111 1 -> sum: 1111000000000100, cout: 0
1011111001111100 1001100010101101 0 -> sum: 0101011100101001, cout: 1
1101010010101110 0010111011000110 1 -> sum: 0000001101110101, cout: 1
0001111001101010 0101111000101001 0 -> sum: 0111110010010011, cout: 0
0011001000110000 0011011000101000 0 -> sum: 0110100001011000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
